thread.title: Vin Diesel Is OK with You Calling Him Fat Because He’s “Had the Best Bod in New York City for Decades”

author: newsr.in
title: Vin Diesel Is OK with You Calling Him Fat Because He’s “Had the Best Bod in New York City for Decades”
text: Earlier this month, as Vin Diesel smoked a cigarette on the balcony of his hotel room in Miami, he had no idea that paparazzi with long-range lenses were taking his photo, much less that, within hours, the Internet would be whipped into a frenzy with talk of how “fat” he’d gotten.
